00024     int load ( std::list<data::Chunk> &chunks, const std::string &filename, const std::string &dialect )  throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00025         if( dialect == "" ) {
00026             //##################################################################################################
00027             //## standard null image
00028             //##################################################################################################
00029             const size_t images = 5;
00030             const size_t timesteps = 10;
00031 
00032             for ( size_t i = 0; i < timesteps; i++ ) {
00033                 for ( size_t c = 0; c < images; c++ ) {
00034 
00035                     data::MemChunk<uint8_t> ch( 50, 50, 50 );
00036                     ch.setPropertyAs( "indexOrigin", util::fvector4( 1, 2, 3 ) );
00037                     ch.setPropertyAs<uint32_t>( "acquisitionNumber", i );
00038                     ch.setPropertyAs<uint16_t>( "sequenceNumber", c );
00039                     ch.setPropertyAs( "performingPhysician", std::string( "Dr. Jon Doe" ) );
00040                     ch.setPropertyAs( "rowVec", util::fvector4(   ( float )1 / sqrtf( 2 ), ( float )1 / sqrtf( 2 ) ) ); //rotated by pi/4 (45Â°)
00041                     ch.setPropertyAs( "columnVec", util::fvector4( ( float ) - 1 / sqrtf( 2 ), ( float )1 / sqrtf( 2 ) ) );
00042                     ch.setPropertyAs( "sliceVec", util::fvector4( 0, 0, 1 ) );
00043                     ch.setPropertyAs( "voxelSize", util::fvector4( 1, 2, 3 ) );
00044                     ch.setPropertyAs( "repetitionTime", 1234 );
00045                     ch.setPropertyAs( "nullDescription", std::string( "The standard null image" ) );
00046 
00047                     for ( int x = 10; x < 40; x++ )
00048                         for ( int y = 10; y < 40; y++ )
00049                             for ( int z = 0; z < 40; z++ )
00050                                 ch.voxel<uint8_t>( x, y, z ) = 255 - i * 20;
00051 
00052                     ch.voxel<uint8_t>( 0, 0 ) = c * 40;
00053                     chunks.push_back( ch );
00054                 }
00055             }
00056 
00057             return timesteps * images;
00058         } else if ( dialect.find( "memimage_" ) == 0 ) {
00059             //##################################################################################################
00060             //## variable image
00061             //##################################################################################################
00062             typedef uint8_t IMAGE_TYPE;
00063             time_t secondsStart = std::time( NULL );
00064             std::stringstream sizeInMBStream( dialect.substr( 9, dialect.size() ) );
00065             size_t imageSizeMB;
00066             sizeInMBStream >> imageSizeMB;
00067             imageSizeMB *= ( 1024 * 1024 ) / sizeof( IMAGE_TYPE );
00068             size_t imageSize = pow( imageSizeMB, 1.0 / 4.0 );
00069             float voxelSize = 1.0;
00070             data::MemChunk<uint8_t> ch ( imageSize, imageSize, imageSize, imageSize );
00071             ch.setPropertyAs( "indexOrigin", util::fvector4() );

00073             ch.setPropertyAs<uint16_t>( "sequenceNumber", 1 );

00075             ch.setPropertyAs( "columnVec", util::fvector4( 0, 1, 0 ) );
00076             ch.setPropertyAs( "sliceVec", util::fvector4( 0, 0, 1 )  );
00077             ch.setPropertyAs( "voxelGap", util::fvector4() );
00078             ch.setPropertyAs( "voxelSize", util::fvector4( voxelSize, voxelSize, voxelSize ) );
00079             std::stringstream imageSizeMBExact;
00080             imageSizeMBExact << ( float )( pow( imageSize, 4 ) * sizeof( IMAGE_TYPE ) ) / ( 1024 * 1024 ) << " mb";
00081             ch.setPropertyAs( "imageSize", imageSizeMBExact.str() );
00082             std::stringstream nullDescription;
00083             nullDescription << "Image with image size " << imageSize << "x" << imageSize << "x" << imageSize << "x" << imageSize;
00084             nullDescription << " and voxelSize " << voxelSize << "x" << voxelSize << "x" << voxelSize << "x" << voxelSize;
00085             ch.setPropertyAs( "nullDescription", nullDescription.str() );
00086             IMAGE_TYPE intensity;
00087 
00088             for ( size_t x = 0; x < imageSize; x++ ) {
00089                 intensity = ( ( float )( std::numeric_limits<IMAGE_TYPE>::max() - std::numeric_limits<IMAGE_TYPE>::min() ) / imageSize ) * x;
00090 
00091                 for ( size_t y = 0; y < imageSize; y++ ) {
00092                     for ( size_t z = 0; z < imageSize; z++ ) {
00093                         for ( size_t t = 0; t < imageSize ; t++ ) {
00094                             ch.voxel<IMAGE_TYPE>( x, y, z, t ) = intensity;
00095                         }
00096                     }
00097                 }
00098             }
00099 
00100             ch.setPropertyAs<size_t>( "timeUsedInS", ( ( float )( std::time( NULL ) - secondsStart ) ) ) ;
00101             chunks.push_back( ch );

00107     void write( const data::Image &image, const std::string &filename, const std::string &dialect )  throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00108         if ( image.getSizeAsVector() != util::fvector4( 50, 50, 50, 10 ) )
00109             throw( std::runtime_error( "Size mismatch (" + image.getSizeAsString() + "!=" + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>( util::fvector4( 50, 50, 50, 10 ) ) + ")" ) );
00110 
00111         const int snum = image.getPropertyAs<int32_t>( "sequenceNumber" );
00112 
00113         for ( int i = 0; i < 10; i++ )
00114             if ( image.voxel<uint8_t>( 0, 0 ) != snum )
00115                 throw( std::runtime_error( "Data mismatch" ) );
00116     }
